alert.note: Alert for Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued April 17 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Fire Warning at the request of Logan County Emergency Management for southeastern Logan County. * AT 441 PM CDT, a wildfire was located 5 miles north of Arcadia, or 7 miles southwest of Meridian, moving northeast. * Evacuation Area... Areas near Westminster and Waterloo Roads north to Charter Oak and Post.. * Evacuation Route... From Westminster and Waterloo Roads, evacuate toward the south. From Charter Oak and Post, evacuate toward the west. * Additional Information... Do not drive into areas of smoke. $$ TL
info.instruction: Evacuate quickly and follow all safety instructions from local emergency management officials. Do not drive into smoke.
